casebody.data:
VALLEY NATIONAL BANK
v.
PRIVATE TRANSERVE, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 2, 2018 John Tartaglia, self-represented, and Linda Tartaglia, self-represented, in support of the petition. Andrew M. McPherson, Bridgeport, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants John Tartaglia and Linda Tartaglia for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 479 , 179 A.3d 1289 (2018), is denied.
